content: I have an open request in condoras thread that will get approved once he is online, but if someone else wants to fill a .03 loan before he does I'll remove my request in his thread. loan terms:Amount .03Repayment amount .0325Repayment date July 25thAddress will be provided in pmAnyone interested, pm me for an address. I'll close my request in the other thread once filled.
